unnormalised: Breaking news, folks! Seems like Mr. R. K. Sharma just got promoted to Chief Innovation Officer at Tata Consultancy Services (TCS). Word on the street is he's been with the company for a cool 15 yrs and finally bagged the big title. Congrats, Mr. Sharma!
normalised: Breaking news, folks! Seems like Mister R. K. Sharma just got promoted to Chief Innovation Officer at T-C-S. Word on the street is he's been with the company for a cool fifteen years and finally bagged the big title. Congrats, Mister Sharma!

unnormalised: And that's not all! Ms. Aishwarya Krishnan is the new Regional Head for South India at Google. The announcement came in this morning at 10 AM. She’s apparently got a killer strategy for boosting Google's presence down south. Exciting times!
normalised: And that's not all! Miss Aishwarya Krishnan is the new Regional Head for South India at Google. The announcement came in this morning at ten A-M. She’s apparently got a killer strategy for boosting Google's presence down south. Exciting times!

unnormalised: Last but not least, heard on the grapevine that Chairman Anil Ambani is stepping down from Reliance Power. Apparently, Mr. Rahul Sharma will be taking over as the interim head. Big changes happening over there! Developing story, stay tuned for more updates.
normalised: Last but not least, heard on the grapevine that Chairman Anil Ambani is stepping down from Reliance Power. Apparently, Mister Rahul Sharma will be taking over as the interim head. Big changes happening over there! Developing story, stay tuned for more updates.
